com.android.devteam.androidwithopencv.adapter

Class ImageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.android.devteam.androidwithopencv.adapter.ImageAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class ImageAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    With this class we set the images for our gallery.

    2016-05-15
